title: Projects
text: Here are some projects that I’m at least somewhat proud of. For now, I’m just adding projects that were part of my Master’s degree at McMaster University.

title: Projects
text:
Probability Theory and Stochastic Processes
Presentation on Martingales and related processes

title: Projects
text:
Bayesian Nonparametrics
Detailed proof of showing that the proportions from the CRP converge in distribution to the GEM distribution
Provided a detailed proof showing that the size-biased permutations of the Poisson-Dirichlet distribution is given by the 2 parameter GEM distributions

title: Projects
